title: Bug 7330 - Improve Accessibility of Actions on Text Selection
description: Certain actions, such as 'Add Javadoc Comment,' are not readily available in the context menu, leading to confusion and the need to switch to the Outline view to access them. There's a need to review the distribution of actions to enhance user experience.
OB: The observed behavior is that the action 'Add Javadoc Comment' is not available in the context menu and needs to be accessed by switching to the Outline view.
EB: I expected the action 'Add Javadoc Comment' to be readily available in the context menu when selecting text.
SR: To address this issue, please ensure that the 'Add Javadoc Comment' action is included in the context menu, making it accessible without the need to switch views. Provide clear and complete steps to reproduce the problem to facilitate the resolution, particularly through the Edit menu.
